title: RecipeFlow
description: The linkage between a recipe process, an action that structures a recipe, and a resource specification.

action.description: Relates a flow input or output to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, improve, etc.

resourceConformsTo.description: The primary resource knowledge specification or definition of an existing or potential resource.

recipeInputOf.description: Relates an input flow to it's node in a recipe.

recipeOutputOf.description: Relates an output flow to it's node in a recipe.

definedQuantity.description: The amount and unit defined for this recipe flow.

$comment: Either the recipeInputOf or recipeOutputOf is also required.
